TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GridViewCommandEventHandler(object sender, GridViewCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GridViewCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GridViewCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GridViewCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void GridViewCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GridViewCommandEventArgs ^ e);
type GridViewCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * GridViewCommandEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Un objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla el evento de un control .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El evento se produce cuando un botón dentro de la se hace clic en el control.The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. Esto le permite proporcionar un método de control de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada siempre que se produce este evento.This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > El control también provoca otros eventos especializados cuando se hace clic en determinados botones (botones con el `CommandName` propiedad establecida en "Delete", "Actualizar" y "Página", por ejemplo).The control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example). Cuando se usa uno de estos botones, considere la posibilidad de controlar uno de los eventos especializados proporcionados por el control (como o ).When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as or ). Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controlador de eventos, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante programación un delegar en el eventos de un control.The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewCommandEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCommandEventHandler/CS/gridviewcommandeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewCommandEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCommandEventHandler/VB/gridviewcommandeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante declaración una delegar en el eventos de un control.The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/CS/gridviewrowcommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/VB/gridviewrowcommandvb.aspx#1)]
